00044 #ifndef __vtkMotionEquationSolver_h

00049 
00050 class vtkDoubleArray;
00051 
00052 class vtkParticleSpringSystem;
00053 class vtkParticleCollection;
00054 class vtkParticle;
00055 
00057 
00058 class VTK_vtkParticleSpringSystem_EXPORT vtkMotionEquationSolver : public vtkObject {
00059 public:
00060 
00062     vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkMotionEquationSolver, vtkObject);
00064     void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00065 
00067     enum MotionEquationSolverType{
00068         Euler = 0,
00069         ModifiedEuler = 1,
00070         VelocityVerlet = 2,
00071         RungeKutta4 = 3
00072     };
00073 
00075     vtkSetMacro(NumberOfParticles, double);// NumberOfParticles
00076 
00078     vtkSetMacro(Residual, double);// NumberOfParticles
00079 
00081     void SetDeformationModel(vtkParticleSpringSystem * model);
00082 
00084 
00087     virtual void Init() = 0;
00088 
00090 
00095     virtual void ComputeNextStep(vtkParticleCollection * particles, double dt) = 0;
00096 
00097 protected:
00098     vtkMotionEquationSolver();
00099     ~vtkMotionEquationSolver();
00100 
00102     vtkParticleSpringSystem * DeformationModel;
00104     double NumberOfParticles;
00105 
00107     double Residual;
00109     vtkDoubleArray * dv;
00111     vtkDoubleArray * dx;
00112 
00113 private:
00114     vtkMotionEquationSolver(const vtkMotionEquationSolver&);            // Not implemented.
00115     void operator=(const vtkMotionEquationSolver&);           // Not implemented.
00116 };
